open.title: Vumatel Outage | Northern Region
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Northern Region, Gauteng, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content:
Outage includes the following areas and areas surrounding

    -Atlasville
    -Brakpan Central
    -Casseldale
    -Crystal Park
    -Dalview
    -Farramere
    -Impala Park
    -Northmead
    -Parkrand
    -Rynfield
    -Selection Park
    -Sunward Park

updates.content: Metrofibre Engineers are reprovisioning affected clients to restore services. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the outage.
Metrofibre are conducting emergency maintenance to resolve the outage as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused.
